official_title: A bill to transfer the National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health to the National Institutes of Health.
subjects: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends the Public Health Service Act and the Occupational Safety and Health Act of 1970 to make the National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health an agency of the National Institutes of Health.

titles.title: A bill to transfer the National Institute for Occupational Safety and Health to the National Institutes of Health.
